name: break
description: Fire events when certain media queries are entered and exited due to a window resize

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-tests && npm run test-urls && npm run test-server
scripts.test-urls:
echo '

-- Run the tests with these links: --

http://localhost:4567/test/modern/index.html
http://localhost:4567/test/legacy/index.html

' > /dev/null
scripts.standalone: npm run clean && mkdir standalone && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify break.js -s createBreakpointManager | ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs - > ./standalone/break.min.js

author: Ben Gourley
